Subject: RE: Byredo Marina Mall Boutique Opening Preparations

Dear All,

Greetings,

 

It was a pleasure e-meeting you yesterday to kick off our weekly meetings for the Byredo Marina Mall Boutique opening.

As discussed, all opening actions have been assigned on the FOCUS platform, so please ensure that the status of each action is updated promptly.

Please also find attached the action list for your review and reference.

As discussed, all opening actions have been assigned on the FOCUS platform, so please ensure that the status of each action is updated promptly.

Please also find attached the action list for your review and reference.

 

Starting next week I will be on annual leave and @Khaled Mostafa <mailto:Khaled.Mostafa@chalhoub.com>  will continue leading the weekly calls.

 

@Jayesh Jayadevan <mailto:Jayesh.Jayadevan@chalhoub.com>  Please consider sharing Ipad quotation with @Cedric Riveccio <mailto:Cedric.Riveccio@puigme.com> .

 

All the best and see you soon.

Regards,
